header.title: BIZICO - WHERE YOUR IDEAS BECOME REALITY
header.description: We are a team of experienced software engineers that enjoy working with you and transforming your ideas into software solutions for your European and US customers

competencies.title: WHAT DO WE DO?
competencies.description: DELIVERING VALUE AND QUALITY WITH DEDICATED SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT TEAMS

items.text: Working together in teams with our senior engineers you are always in direct control of the scope, time, budget, and quality of your project.
You are able to focus on your solution requirements while we take care of the development and testing.
It is our responsibility to deliver quality results in the shortest period of time to you and your clients.
